Issue.creator: ltseeley
Issue.summary: Backport consensus message queue fix to 1.1
Issue.description: Backport PRs https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/2067 and possibly https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/2076 to Sawtooth 1.1. This fixes an issue where blocks may arrive out of order to consensus.
